name: Hanzi Study
description: Hanzi Study contains over 2600 Hanzi Characters based on HSK character list. HSK (Hny Shupng Kosh) is Chinas standardized exam for non-native speakers that tests and rates Chinese language proficiency  Hanzi sorted by HSK level into manageable study lessons. Fast dynamic search function. Text to Speech enabled to hear correct pronunciation. Radicals show root meaning of Hanzi Characters Stroke Animations  Upgrade to test yourself with flashcards and keep track of progress.
